DOC.brief_summary: This study involves the development and evaluation of a web-based, interactive education program on chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) for primary care clinicians. The research questions that this proposal addresses include: 1. Can an interactive, web-based COPD course be developed to disseminate evidence-based, best practice recommendations to primary care clinicians? 2. Can assessment tools be developed to evaluate the impact of the program on clinician behavior in clinical practice and on patient care?
DOC.brief_title: Web-based, Interactive Professional Education for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Primary care clinicians in training willing to participate Specialists
